short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bailii Legal Tailor applies custom fonts and styling to enhance reading on the bailii.org website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bailii Legal Tailor is an essential extension for legal professionals, scholars, and enthusiasts who frequently access the British and Irish Legal Information Institute (bailii.org) website.

What Does Bailii Legal Tailor Do?
Bailii Legal Tailor is designed to enhance your reading experience on the Bailii website by applying elegant custom fonts, styling, and formatting. It's not just about aesthetics; it's about making legal documents more accessible and enjoyable to read.

Key Features:

Custom Fonts: Experience legal texts in sophisticated typefaces that provide a refined reading experience.
Responsive Styling: Tailored formatting for different elements like blockquotes, lists, and links ensures a consistent and pleasing visual flow.
Easy Navigation: Navigate through complex legal documents with ease, thanks to the intuitive design and layout adjustments.
Why Choose Bailii Legal Tailor?

For Legal Professionals: Enhance your research efficiency with well-organised and styled documents.

For Students & Academics: Improve your study sessions with clear and elegant text presentation.
For Legal Enthusiasts: Enjoy reading legal cases with a touch of sophistication.

How to Use:
Simply install the Bailii Legal Tailor extension, and it will automatically apply the custom styling to the supported pages on the Bailii website. No additional setup or configuration is required.

Privacy & Permissions:
Bailii Legal Tailor respects your privacy and only requires necessary permissions to function. It does not collect or store any personal information.

Support & Feedback:
We value your feedback and are committed to providing continuous updates and support. If you have any questions, suggestions, or need assistance, please feel free to reach out.

Elevate your legal reading experience with Bailii Legal Tailor. Download now and discover the elegance of tailored legal texts.
